-MTpcli73mfiIqW0lpPe.title: function
-MTpcli73mfiIqW0lpPe.definition: A function in JavaScript is similar to a procedure—a set of statements that performs a task or calculates a value, but for a procedure to qualify as a function, it should take some input and return an output where there is some obvious relationship between the input and the output

-MTpcli9kmjpvbdr-ckb.title: Heading tag
-MTpcli9kmjpvbdr-ckb.definition: The heading tag is used in HTML to define headings of a page. Headings are defined by <hn> , with “n” being a number between 1 and 6, and determines which position a heading has in the hierarchy of the heading structure. Heading tags have a particularly important function within an HTML structure
